subject: Re: my api is running slowly

messages.content:
Subject: Re: my api is running slowly

[FOLLOW-UP to ticket TKT-1769917703577]

Original issue: api is running slowly and experiences outages at moderate concurrency

Customer follow-up: I was using a production environment in us-east-1 and was trying to make api calls to my LLM provider as part of a normal app workflow

extracted_fields.impact: api is running slowly and experiences outages at moderate concurrency

merged_extracted_fields.impact: api is running slowly and experiences outages at moderate concurrency

current_triage.rationale: The customer is experiencing performance issues with the API in a production environment, which indicates a significant impact on their operations.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P1 priority. Escalated per enterprise account policy.
